info.name: CGS Schedule Background
info.description:
This is a simple style that allows the user to set a custom image as the background for the schedule. </br>
Recommended Images: </br>
http://i.imgur.com/yWjwn3d.jpg </br>
http://i.imgur.com/Cbxh6OL.png </br>
http://i.imgur.com/Fpk3FlG.jpg </br>
